maqras.text: 22|1|Zhongren a! Nimen yingdang jingwei nimen de zhu, fuhuo shi di dizhen, que shi yi jian dashi.

22|2|Zai na ri, nimen kanjian dizhen xia mei ge rumu dou bei xia de wangjile ying'er, xia de mei ge yunfu dou yao liuchan; ni ba renmen kan cheng shi zui han, qishi tamen bingfei shi zui han, er shi yin wei an la de xingfa shi yanjun de.
22|3|Youren wuzhi di jinxing guanyu an la de zhenglun, bingqie shuncong panni de emo.
22|4|Fan jiejiao emo zhe, emo biding shi ta mi wu, biding ba ta yinru huo yu de xingfa, zhe shi gei zhudingle de.

22|5|Zhongren a! Ruguo nimen duiyu fuhuo de shi hai zai huaiyi zhi zhong, name, wo que yi chuangzaole nimen, xian yong nitu, ji yong yi xiao di jingye, ji yong yikuai ningxie, ji yong wanzheng de he bu wanzheng de rou tuan, yibian wo dui nimen chanming (daoli). Wo shi wo suo yu de (tai'er) zai zigong li anju yige dingqi, ranhou, wo shi nimen chusheng wei ying'er, ranhou (wo rang nimen huozhe), yibian nimen dadao chengnian. Nimen zhong you yaozhe de; you fu fan yu zui lie de nianji de, yibian ta zai you zhishi zhihou, shenme ye bu zhidao. Ni kan dadi shi bumao de, dang wo shi yushui jiang yu dadi de shihou, ta jiu huodong he pengzhang, erqie shengchu ge zhong meili de zhiwu.
22|6|Zhe shi yin wei an la shi zhen zai, ta neng shi sizhe fusheng, ta duiyu wanshi shi quanneng.
22|7|Fuhuo que shi yao lailin de, hao wuyi yi. An la yao shi fenmu li de ren fuhuo qilai.
22|8|Youren zhenglun an la, dan ta ji wu zhishi, you wu zhidao, qie wu canlan de jingdian.
22|9|Ta aoman de zou kai, yibian you ren panli an la de dadao. Ta zai jinshi yao shou lingru, fuhuo ri wo yao ta changshi shaozhuo de xingfa.
22|10|Zhe shi yinwei ni suo fan de zuixing, ye yin wei an la jue bushi kuidai zhong puren de.
22|11|Youren zai bianyuan shang chongbai an la, ruo huo fuli, ta jiu anran xiangshou; ruo zao huohai, ta jiu qingshuai beipan. Ta jiang sangshi jinshi he houshi, zhe shi mingxian de kuisun.
22|12|Ta she an la er qidao na duiyu ta ji wu huo you wu fu de dongxi, zhe shi bu jin qingli de mi wu.
22|13|Ta qidao na you jin huo er wu yuan fu de dongxi, ta de yuanzhu zhe zhen elie! Zuo ta de tongban de zhen elie!
22|14|An la biding yao shi xindao erqie xingshan zhe jinru na xia lin zhu he de leyuan. An la jiu zheyang zuo tasuo yu yi zhi shi.
22|15|Shei caixiang an la zai jinshi he houshi jue bu xiangzhu ta, jiao shei xuanliang zijin, jiao ta kan ta de jice neng fou jiechu ta de fennu!
22|16|Wo zheyang jiang shi “gulanjing”, zuowei mingxian de jixiang, an la que shi yindao tasuo yu yindao de.
22|17|Xindao zhe, youtai jiaotu, sa bi an ren, jidu jiaotu, baihuojiao tu, yiji yi wu pei zhu zhe, fuhuo ri an la biding yao wei tamen panjue, an la que shi wanwu de jianzheng zhe.

22|18|Ni nandao bu zhidao ma? Zai tianshang de he zai dishang de, yu ri yue qunxing, shanyue shumu, shengchu he xuduo ren, dou wei an la er koutou, you xuduo ren dang shou xingfa. An la lingru shei, shei bu shou zunjing. An la jiu zheyang zuo tasuo yu yi zhi shi.
